name: Swarm Of Skulls
description:
Swarm of skulls is a vertically scrolling shooter where you play as a Necromancer trying to escape from the graveyard with his horde. 

You will control your skulls to block bullets and destroy cannons to try to escape.

It is recommended that you play the tutorial before playing the main game.

Controls:

WASD: Move

SPACE: Direct Skulls

This game was created for the ScoreSpace x 8 Bits to Infinity Game Jam
